cta.title: Start now to maximize your earnings
cta.description: Sign up in 3 minutes! Experience the new standard of crypto referrals with CoinToss.

items.question: What is CoinToss?
items.answer: CoinToss is an all-in-one platform for cryptocurrency exchange referrals. We provide industry-leading commission rates (up to 85%) and AI automation features to help partners generate revenue more efficiently.

items.question: Which exchanges are integrated?
items.answer: We partner with over 12 major global exchanges including Binance, OKX, Bybit, Gate.io, MEXC, KuCoin, and are continuously expanding.

items.question: What are the AI automation features?
items.answer: Two AI assistants, Crea (content generation) and Danny (data analysis), automatically perform marketing content creation, customer analysis, and performance optimization 24/7.

items.question: How are commissions settled?
items.answer: Through a transparent blockchain-based settlement system, automatically paid in USDT on the 1st of each month. All transaction details are available in real-time.

items.question: What are CTOSS tokens?
items.answer: Utility tokens in the CoinToss ecosystem used for additional rewards, premium features, and governance participation. They are automatically earned based on activity.
